title: House for sale in Imaduwa
details:
¤ Faced to Galle-Deniyaye (A17) main road.

¤ 1Km to Imaduwa town and 1.5km away fron Imaduwa highway entrance.

¤ 20km to Galle(10mins via highway)

¤ 4 Bed rooms with two bathrooms.

¤ 3 phase electricity, clean well water.

¤ Has a very scenic view from the upper part of the land.

¤ Price can be negotiated after inspection.
